tool.name: bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
tool.description: Left-align and normalize indels; check if REF alleles match the reference; split multiallelic sites into multiple rows; recover multiallelics from multiple rows

param.name: check_ref
param.label: Check REF
param.help: What to do when incorrect or missing REF allele is encountered

param.name: do_not_normalize
param.label: Skip Normalization, just set REF allele
param.help: Do not normalize indels, just fix or set the REF allele from the reference (-N, --do-not-normalize with -m or -c s)

param.name: multiallelics
param.label: ~multiallelics
param.option: split multiallelic sites into biallelic records (-)
join biallelic sites into multiallelic records (+)

param.name: multiallelic_types
param.label: variant types which should be split or merged
param.option: snps - only SNP records should be split or merged
indels - only indel records should be split or merged
both - records should be split or merged
any - SNPs and indels should be merged into a single record

param.name: strict_filter
param.label: Strict Filter
param.help: When merging (-m+), merged site is PASS only if all sites being merged PASS

param.name: site_win
param.label: Site Window
param.help: (-w, --site-win) Buffer for sorting lines which changed position during realignment
